snippet: President Hamid Karzai’s appointment of Umar Daudzai as interior minister was public confirmation that he would not be Mr. Karzai’s favored successor.
abstract: Afghan Pres Hamid Karzai chooses his ambassador to Pakistan, Umar Daudzai, as new Afghan interior minister; appointment, on eve of declaration period for potential presidential candidates, offers public confirmation that Daudzai would not be Karzai’s favored successor

byline.contributor: Alissa J. Rubin and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: President Hamid Karzai’s appointment of Umar Daudzai as interior minister was public confirmation that he would not be Mr. Karzai’s favored successor.

headline.main: Afghan Envoy to Pakistan Is Appointed Interior Minister
headline.print_headline: Afghan Envoy to Pakistan Is Appointed Interior Minister
